name: Fire Frenzy (the Game Jam edition)
description:
Submission for Mini Jam 99.
Limitation: Can't stop moving.

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD / d-pad
Sprint: Shift / X button

HOW TO PLAY

Avoid immolators while saving civilians. Civilians become immolators when burned by one. Immolators burn out and die over time.

Thanks for playing!
